At the exhibition "Francis Bacon: Man and Beast" (Francis Bacon: Man
and Beast) 45 paintings by the author will be presented. It covers the
entire 50-year career of the artist: here are the early canvases of the
1930s and 40s, which depict biomorphic creatures

From January 29 to
April 17
Where:
at the Royal Academy
of Arts in London.
